definition: hanging by a thread/very precarious/almost extinct/(of sound) linger on faintly
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
strand/thread/detailed/in detail/classifier for wisps (of smoke, mist or vapor), strands, locks (of hair)

sentences.english: His last words is still ringing in my ears.
sentences.chinese: 他最後的遺言依然在我的耳邊不絕如縷。
